title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. (Additional Steps Required)
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The list box should retain the modified default value.
SR: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. (Additional Steps Required)
